commit.message:
configure.in: Remove check for -fuse-divide-subroutine.

	* configure.in: Remove check for -fuse-divide-subroutine.
	* configure: Rebuilt.

From-SVN: r38184

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2000-12-11  Bryce McKinlay  <bryce@albatross.co.nz>
+
+	* configure.in: Remove check for -fuse-divide-subroutine.
+	* configure: Rebuilt.
+
 2000-12-11  Bryce McKinlay  <bryce@albatross.co.nz>
 
 	* Makefile.am: Add HashSet.java and java/lang/ref classes.
